amendment.description: To make available an additional $200,000,000 to increase the number of border personnel at the northern border of the United States by the end of fiscal year 2004.

action.text: Amendment SA 1351 ruled out of order by the chair.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 1351 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 45 - 51. Record Vote Number: 298.
Point of order under the Budget Act raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 1351.

Amendment SA 1351 proposed by Senator Schumer. (consideration: CR S9780-9782, S9783; text: CR S9781) To make available an additional $200,000,000 to increase the number of border personnel at the northern border of the United States by the end of fiscal year 2004.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 1351 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 45 - 51. Record Vote Number: 298.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1351 proposed by Senator Schumer.
